author: djrtwo
content: Every full node does data availability sampling. This in combination with erasure encoding allowing reconstruction of the data allows for the network as a whole to be resistant to 99%+ vals making claims about unavailable data

author: djrtwo
content: Many explanations of sharding only explain committee based custody which does assuming 2/3 val honesty but they fail to note that if committee based custody fails, they cannot trick the network to follow unavailable chains due to DAS
